ctx: assert (H: power n (1 + a) = 1 * power n (1 + a)).
exceptions.exn: In environment a, n : nat H : power n (S a) = power n (S a) + 0 Unable to unify "binomial n 0 * power 0 a + ∑ n (fun n0 : nat => binomial n (S n0) * power (S n0) a)" with "binomial n 0 * power (n - 0) 1 * power 0 a + ∑ n (fun n0 : nat => binomial n (S n0) * power (n - S n0) 1 * power (S n0) a)".

original: assert (H: power n (1 + a) = 1 * power n (1 + a)). { rewrite Nat.mul_1_l. reflexivity. } rewrite Newton_nat with (a:=1) (b:=a). rewrite <- H. reflexivity.
